original: Jern, Ernst Seth, grosshandlare, Väster viik, f. 5/3/88 i Västervik av grossh. P. J. o. Auigusta Wærnmark. G. 15 m. Jeni Bksitedt. Barn: Niib f. 18, Axel 19, Sven 21, Birgitta 25. — Stud:ex. i Västervik 08. E. o. tullkamm: skriv. 08-18, anst. i fad. koloniialvarufirma Adam Jern & Co. fr. 14, deläg. 18, ensam inneh. sed. 24, förest, f. Västerviks Jästförsäljn. A-B sed. 34. Ordf. i sjö-mansh :direkt., v. ordf. i hamndirekt., ordf. i hand:- o. sjöfartsndn, led. av lokalstyr. f. Västerviks h. a. 1., ma-gistr. besiktn :man, brasiliansk konsu-laragent 20-29, ordf. i styr. f. A-B Gbgs Banks avd :kont. i Västervik, huv:man i Västerviks Sparbank, ordf. i styr. f. Hand:fören. i Västervik, rev:ordf. i Norsholm-Västervik-Hults-freds Järnv. A-B, rev. i System A-B i Västervik o. i Västerviks Stuv. A-B, led. av styr. f. N. Smål stadshypo-teksfören. i Jönköp., Smål.-Blek. en-grosfören. o. Tjustbygd. kulturhist. fören., v. ordf. i tjänarinnefonden. Ex. ÖM o. Vet. i Odd Felilow, medl. a.v Par Bricoile.
translated: Jern, Ernst Seth, merchant, Väster Viik, b. 5/3/88 in Västervik to merchant P. J. and Augusta Wærnmark. Married 15 with Jeni Bksitedt. Children: Niib b. 18, Axel b. 19, Sven b. 21, Birgitta b. 25. - Graduated from Västervik high school in 1908. Acting customs clerk 1908-1918, employed in paternal colonial goods firm Adam Jern & Co. from 1914, partner 1918, sole proprietor since 1924, manager of Västerviks Yeast Sales Ltd. since 1934. Chairman of the Seamen's Home Board, vice-chairman of the Port Board, chairman of the Trade and Shipping Committee, member of the local government for Västerviks h. a. 1., inspecting officer for the magistrate, Brazilian consular agent 1920-1929, chairman of the board for AB Göteborgs Bank branch in Västervik, chief executive of Västerviks Savings Bank, chairman of the board for the Trade Association in Västervik, audit committee chairman of Norsholm-Västervik-Hults peace railway AB, auditor for System AB in Västervik and Västerviks Stuv AB, member of the board for N. Småland Mortgage Association in Jönköping, Småland-Blekinge Wholesale Association, and Tjustbygd Cultural History Association, vice-chairman of the maidservant fund. Decorated with the Order of the Sword and the Free Masons' Order of Odd Fellow, member of the Par Bricoile.

affiliation.name: N. Småland Mortgage Association in Jönköping

awards.name: Free Masons' Order of Odd Fellow
